nodes.text: Hanna City Spaceport was the main spaceport in Hanna City, capital of Chandrila. It was the largest starport on the planet.

Consisting of three 20-story hangar buildings on the western side of Hanna City's downtown, the cylindrical towers were a kilometer wide and were punctuated with the gapping maws of dozens of hangar bays. Each bay was equipped with tractor projectors which guided landing craft to a smooth landing. The spaceport could accommodate craft 600 meters long.

Operated by the Chandrilan Security Force, the Spaceport's security focused on preventing the introduction of harmful parasites which could be intentionally or unintentionally introduced to Chandrila from off world craft.
